Projects

Software

  • MetLab, a metagenomics analysis pipeline
  • Taxadb, a python library to query the ncbi taxonomy
  • InSilicoSeq, a sequencing simulator

Organisations

  • EMBnet, one of the oldest european bioinformatics network
  • B3Africa, a cooperation platform for biobank integration between Africa and Europe
